::Firearm::

Firearm feels pain shooting up from the bottom of the tank, as well 
as Squawktalk's shots hitting the tob, but the latter didn't 
penetrate the armor. He runs a quick internal check, making sure that 
the damage circuits were nothing major, and then activates the 
boosters on his left side. The ones on his right, along with most of 
his right side, were missing due to his missing let.

The boosters cause Firearm to spin through the air, smashing into the 
ground on the same stop that Beastbox had ended up.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> "Slag, this gonna hurt Beastbox" Beastbox frantically grabs 
whatever he can
> from the inside of Firarm (Wires chips, you name it), moving his 
arms
> around quickly, and as he notices the speed of the ground 
aproaching him,
> he tries to jump out from underneath, ripping whatever he grabs. He 
tries
> to use his feet (like hands because he is a gorrilla) and his hands 
to
> stradle around to the top side of Firearm's tank mode.
> 
> OOC: Yanshosh, you go ahead and tell me if any of this works, okay.
